zombiewar.intf

Interface ICharacter

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ISurvivor, IZombie
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Character, Child, CommonInfected, Predator, Soldier, Student, Tank, Teacher

    public interface ICharacter
    The ICharacter represents possible characters in the game. A character has certain amount of health. The amount of health depends on the specific character. When its health reaches 0, it is dead. A character health is decreased by an enemy in an attack.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void decreaseHealth(int increment)
      decrease in health as a result of being attacked.
      boolean isAlive()
      Is the character still alive?

    • Method Detail

      • decreaseHealth

        void decreaseHealth(int increment)
        decrease in health as a result of being attacked.
        Parameters:
        increment - the amount of health to decrease.

      • isAlive

        boolean isAlive()
        Is the character still alive?
        Returns:
        true if still alive.
